author: fmeschbe
msg: SLING-1872 Rewamp the recent requests display:
- Adapt to new JQuery UI styles
- Use POST requests to clear recordings
- Add configuration option to SlingMainServlet for max number of recorded requests
- Replace rotated array by LinkedHashMap to keep requests
- Copy displayed values instead of keep the SlingHttpServletRequest for display

author: cmpilato
msg: Issue #3693 - Multi-target update output is quite confusing.
Add notifications at the start of each performed update, and a summary
at the end of the whole mess.  Here are samples of the new output:
svn_client_update4(), and feed them to print_update_summary().
(exp_noop_up_out): New abbreviation, now used everywhere a test was
previously expecting output of ["At revision REV.\n"]

previously expecting output of ["At revision REV.\n"]
(another_hudson_problem): Adjust expectations according to these changes.

previously expecting output of ["At revision REV.\n"]
